title: Best, Worst Rookie Fits, Minicamp News/Notes with Chris Trapasso (Football 6/5)
description:
Will Brinson and CBS NFL Draft Writer Chris Trapasso break down the latest news and notes from around the league, including Duke Johnson's trade request, several Lions vets holding out, Trent Williams missing from minicamp and much more, then dive into the best and worst fits for NFL rookies in 2019.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
